summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6293 for the improvement of the alley between Block 11, Plat of Alki Point and Block 2, A.A. Smith's 2nd Addition, being the alley between 59th Ave. Southwest and 60th Ave. Southwest, from Alki Ave. Southwest to Southwest St.; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 92443 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
